page.title: 20Clubs Lorton W.I.
page.content: Lorton Women's Institute has 40 members, 8 of whom have compiled these pages. Mrs Evelyn Fielding has lived here for 10 years. She recently retired as deputy matron of an old people's home. Mrs Mary Findlay recently retired from teaching. Came to Lorton 10 years ago. Mrs Sheila Mills came here 3 years ago and works a small holding locally. Mrs Heather Shield has lived here since the age of 4. Now at 36 is a working farmers wife. Mrs Enid Petty moved to Lorton 12 years ago and works in a local tea shop.Mrs Mary Tyson came here 8 years ago when her husband retired.Mrs Judith Benn was born, lives and works in the valley. Mrs Barbara Newton moved here in 1979 as the local policeman's wife.
